singlesqllist.product_reg_union: SELECT pr.productNum, pr.productAcctNum,pr.PortfolioNum,r.exchId,r.regId,r.offerRegId,r.regName,r.currencyId,r.deskId,r.F_hedgeFlagList,r.regStatus,r.exchProperty,r.memo,r.openDate,r.optId,r.acctId,r.thirdSystemId,r.fixFlag,p.flag,p.PortfolioName,a.prodAcctType,a.acctPermitList,a.ownertype,a.branchCode,r.regPermitList,r.grantStkTypeList FROM Registration r,Account a,bside_account ba,BSide_product_Reg pr LEFT JOIN BSide_PfolioBaseinfo p ON pr.productNum = p.productNum AND pr.portfolioNum = p.portfolioNum WHERE r.exchId = pr.exchId AND r.regId = pr.regId AND r.thirdSystemId = a.ThirdSystemId AND r.acctId = a.acctId AND ba.thirdSystemId = a.ThirdSystemId AND ba.acctId = a.acctId AND ba.productNum = pr.productNum AND ba.productAcctNum = pr.productAcctNum
